mapper.insert: insert into articles(bm_seq, title, contents, writer, isNotice, isComment) VALUES (#{bm_seq}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, #{isNotice}, #{isComment})
mapper.select: select count(seq) from articles where isNotice = 0 and isDelete = 0

select a.*, b.title as b_title from articles as a inner join boardmanager b on a.bm_seq = b.seq where a.isNotice = 0 and a.isDelete = 0
order by a.seq desc limit #{startPage}, #{perPageNum}
select a.*, b.title as b_title from articles as a inner join boardmanager b on a.bm_seq = b.seq where a.isNotice = 1 and a.isDelete = 0 order by a.seq desc
